name: House of horror (EnroGame)
description:
HOUSE OF HORROR is a real atmospheric horror game without screaming, but with great sound and visual effects that can keep in suspense as you progress through the game.

    The game consists of 3 floors, where the magic crystals are located, which are necessary for the passage of the game, and the 1st secret room, in which you need to get a secret magic crystal.

    In this game, mindfulness and sound are very useful helpers. Try to explore the rooms as much as possible, checking everything from a regular bed to barrels.

    Enjoy your game and good luck!
